We are a USA based company offering solutions to Virtual Private Server owners. KVMVPS servers are located in the United States of America and Netherlands with the highest grade of premium bandwidth. All servers come with SolusVM control panel with several features. KVMVPS strives to keep customers happy with 100% uptime. If by any chance we do not give 100% up-time, our service level agreement is sure to cover it. We make sure that all Virtual Machines are strictly updated with the top demands of software. Our budget plans allow you to start easily and grow. Our KVM servers run on the highest demand of features and have a guarantee of 100% Uptime.

KVM Server Location: Buffalo, NY, USA

Why KVM Virtualization? It's a complete virtualization solution with a self-upgrading hypervisor and cloud-based centralized management.

Why you should choose us?

* 100% Uptime/ If not Service level agreement covers the costs.
* Truly Dedicated support - Experienced Staff with 5+ years of experience.
* Fully optimized control panel with several features- Full physical like control to your virtual machine, like IPMI
* Raid-10 Protected Diskspace- I/O and files a fully secure, if one of our hard-disks fail, we got you covered.
* 1x1 Gigabit portspeed- Fully dedicated shared gigabit port.
* On demand OS re-installs- Install any Operating System of your choice with the click of a button
* Never recieve any slow speeds, maximum 5 hour hardware replacement and networking
